ygData.subject: Re: New Player
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for all the tips, links and advice. I m going to follow that guide and start making myself some coverings and see about selling some also. My pc is
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for all the tips, links and advice. I'm going to follow that
guide and start making myself some coverings and see about selling
some also.

My pc is Electa, Shadow Knight, Human - Lvl 3 roaming Freeport and
East Commonlands at the moment on Tribunal. No Guild. I'm studying
in the tunnels beneath Freeport.

With the exception of getting dismantled by a Lion and Bear attacking
me, with no provoking on my part - its been cool. But if there is a
better place a Shadow Knight of this low level could find kills or
what time of guild I should be looking at - I'm very open to advice!

Thanks!
DLG


--- In EverQuest@y..., "Su" <suceress@k...> wrote:
> Where are you hunting?
> If you're in Gfay area I can probably help you out sometime. A cool
thing to
> do is collect crushbone belts and turn them in. You get some
patchwork armor
> that you can wear. It's cruddy, but it's a start.
> Basically kill critters til you get armor. When you start hunting
higher
> level mobs they start dropping more coin.
> Most of my characters are on the Tribunal.
> You can contact Elzeria, Damita, and Tiladanu (I know I'm missing
some but
> can't remember their names right now).
> What class and race? In a guild yet?
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > Hello All
> >
> > I know I'm about 20 years late, but I'm making that transition
from
> > Ultima Online and MUD to EQ. I've been enjoying it so far on the
> > Tribunal Server. THINGS ARE EXPENSIVE! Leveling is pretty balance.
> > Plenty of helpful players!
> >
> > I'm just looking for advice on how to get more money. A player
gave
> > me a sweet sword does high damage, but other than that I'm naked.
> >
> > Thanks
> > DLG
> >
